SELECT h.*, t.*, s.*, d.* FROM house h INNER JOIN type t ON h.type_id = t.tid INNER JOIN street s ON h.street_id = s.sid INNER JOIN district d ON s.district_id = d.did WHERE h.id = #{id} GROUP BY h.id;
